data.text: Wain nye fewuɖula eye aha muame nye avuwɔla,
Fia ƒe dziku doa vɔvɔ̃ abe dzata ƒe gbetete ene
Bubu wònye na ŋutsu ne eƒo asa na dzre
Kuviatɔ meŋlɔa agble le agbledeɣi o,
Ŋutsu ƒe tameɖoɖowo nye tɔ goglo,
Ŋutsu geɖewo gblɔna be lɔlɔ̃ matrɔ le yewo si
Ame dzɔdzɔe nɔa agbe si ŋu kpɔtsɔtsɔ mele o;
Ne fia nɔ anyi ɖe eƒe fiazikpui dzi be yeadrɔ̃ ʋɔnu la,
Ame ka ate ŋu agblɔ bena,
Yehowa lé fu nudakpe vovovo eve
Wonyaa ɖevi gɔ̃ hã to eƒe nuwɔna me,
Yehowa wɔ to si sea nu
Mègalɔ̃ alɔ̃ tsu dɔdɔ o, ne menye nenema o la,
Nuƒlela gblɔna be,
Sika li, adzagba hã li fũu
Xɔ avɔ le ame si da megbe na amedzro la si,
Nuɖuɖu si wokpɔ to amefuflu me la vivina na ŋutsu,
Wɔ ɖoɖo to aɖaŋuxɔxɔ me,
Amenyagblɔla ʋua go nya ɣaɣla
Ne ŋutsu do ɖiŋu na fofoa alo dadaa la,
Domenyinu si wokpɔ to mɔ kpui dzi le gɔmedzedzea me la,
Mègagblɔ be,
Yehowa lé fu nudakpe ƒomevi vovovowo
Yehowa fiaa afɔɖeɖe ame,
Mɔ wònye na ame ne ekɔ nane ŋu tamemabumabutɔe
Fia nyanu gbɔa ame vɔ̃ɖiwo
Yehowa ƒe akaɖi kpɔa ame ƒe gbɔgbɔ me
Lɔlɔ̃ kple nuteƒewɔwɔ nana fia nɔa dedinɔnɔ me
Ɖekakpuiwo ƒe ŋusẽe nye woƒe ŋutikɔkɔe
Kɔ kple abixɔxɔ ɖea vɔ̃ ɖa
